title: Chief Technology Officer
description: Our exciting DeSci (Decentralized Science) Life Science Metaverse startup is looking for a Chief Technology Officer (CTO). Ideal candidates have worked in startup environments, enjoy working remotely, have an innovative mindset and are familiar with the Web 3.0 space. Blockchain Development experience required. Dev Ops experience required. VR experience preferred. Life science industry experience preferred. Competing for multiple funding opportunities (6/19/2023). VR Development under way. Blockchain framework complete. Will get co-founder level stock options with highly innovative project.
